# Support

Thank you for using Tools.TheChels.uk! If you need help or have questions, here are the ways you can get support:

## Getting Help

### Documentation

- **README**: Check the [README.md](../README.md) for project overview and setup instructions.
- **Contributing Guide**: See [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) for guidelines on how to contribute.
- **Code of Conduct**: Review our [CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md](CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md) for community standards.

### Reporting Issues

If you encounter a bug or have a feature request:

1. **Search Existing Issues**: Check if your issue has already been reported in the [issue tracker](https://github.com/mat-0/Tools.TheChels.uk/issues).
2. **Create a New Issue**: If you don't find an existing issue, [open a new issue](https://github.com/mat-0/Tools.TheChels.uk/issues/new) with:
   - A clear and descriptive title
   - Steps to reproduce the problem
   - Expected vs. actual behavior
   - Any relevant screenshots or error messages

### Security Issues

For security vulnerabilities, please follow our [Security Policy](SECURITY.md) and report them responsibly to security@thechels.uk.

## Community

This is a hobby project maintained by [@Mat-0](https://github.com/Mat-0). While feedback, discourse, and suggestions are welcome, all actions are at the owner's discretion.

### Ways to Help

- Report bugs and suggest features through issues
- Submit pull requests for bug fixes or enhancements
- Improve documentation
- Share the project with others

## Additional Resources

- **Project Website**: [https://tools.thechels.uk](https://tools.thechels.uk)
- **Funding**: If you'd like to support the project, see [FUNDING.yml](FUNDING.yml) for sponsorship options.

---

Thank you for being part of the Tools.TheChels.uk community!
